DOC.brief_summary: 58 patient 18 76 year attend Operative Dentistry Clinic Dental School , Universidad de Chile , include study . Those patient bleach include study sign consent form . The patient treat 10 % carbamide peroxide ( CP ) gel ( Whiteness Perfect , FGM ) subject verbal instruction 3 week daily application 1 hour accord manufacturer indication , procedure apply OHIP-Esthetics , PIDAQ OES questionnaire form , 30 minute answer , complete , immediately one month control post-bleaching procedure .
DOC.detailed_description: This study approve Ethics Committee Faculty Dentistry ( 13/18a ) . This study include 58 patient age 18 76 year attend Operative Dentistry Clinic Dental School Local University eligible bleaching ( see eligibility criterion next item ) . Dental bleaching , free charge , suggest patient way improve patient 's smile . The patient inform benefit possible side effect procedure standardized manner . Eligibility criteria dental bleaching Participants evaluate dental chair prophylactic dental treatment pumice water . To eligible dental bleaching , participant good general oral health . Each subject least one central incisor shade A2 darker , assess comparison value-oriented shade guide ( Vita classical ; Vita Zahnfabrik , Bad Säckingen , Germany ) . Patients undergone previous dental bleaching procedure , orthodontic treatment , pregnant lactating , bruxism habit eligible dental bleaching . Participants restoration labial surface anterior teeth , non-carious cervical lesion , veneer , full crown , gingival recession , spontaneous tooth pain , internal tooth discoloration , teeth endodontic treatment fluorosis also include could immediately eligible dental bleaching . Bleaching Procedure For participant bleach procedure , make alginate impression subject 's maxillary mandibular arch , fill dental stone . We apply block-out material labial surface . A 1-mm soft vinyl material , provide manufacturer ( FGM Dental Products , Joinville , SC , Brazil ) use fabricate custom-fitted tray hold bleach gel . The bleaching tray trim 1 mm beyond marginal gingiva deliver 10 % carbamide peroxide ( CP ) gel ( Whiteness Perfect , FGM ) participant . We give verbal instruction apply product 1 hour daily 3 week . After application , patient remove tray , wash water , brush teeth usual . Verbal instruction oral hygiene also give , encourage regular brushing fluoridate toothpaste contain whitening component . For participant , OHIP-Esthetics , PIDAQ OES survey apply , one week one month end bleaching procedure , patient also give 30 minute complete . Color Evaluation Color evaluation perform use subjective objective method . For subjective evaluation , 16 tab Vita shade Classical guide Vita classical ( Vita Zahnfabrik , Bad Säckingen , Germany ) arrange high ( B1 ) low ( C4 ) value use determine tooth color . Although scale linear true sense , treat continuous linear ranking . Two calibrate evaluator agreement least 85 % ( use weight kappa statistic ) record shade middle area labial surface upper central right incisor accord American Dental Association guideline . Color register baseline treatment ( first , second , third week bleaching ) , one week one month end bleach protocol corroborate effectiveness bleach procedure . The color change baseline recall time calculated change number shade guide unit ( ΔSGU ) , occur toward light end value-oriented list shade tab . In case operator disagree color , consensus reach dismiss patient . In objective evaluation , digital spectrophotometer ( Vita Easyshade , Vita Zahnfabrik ) reliability 97 % use . An impression maxillary arch take dense silicone paste ( Coltoflax Perfil Cub , Vigodent , Rio de Janeiro , Brazil ) window create labial surface silicone guide use metal device radius 6 mm allow adaptation tip spectrophotometer device standardize spectrophotometric color evaluation across recall period . The color coordinate ( L* , a* , b* ) record . The value L* represent value 0 ( black ) 100 ( white ) , a* b* represent color along red-green axis yellow-blue axis , respectively . The difference baseline recall period ( ∆E ) calculate use formula ( CIE , 1978 ) ∆E = [ ( ∆L* ) 2+ ( ∆a* ) 2+ ( ∆b* ) 2 ] 1/2 . Tooth Sensitivity Evaluation Patients ask keep daily record whether experienced tooth sensitivity ( TS ) . The participant instructed indicate daily pain use visual analog scale ( VAS ) .3 , 6 , 7 This scale 10-cm horizontal line label tooth sensitivity one end unbearable tooth sensitivity end . The patient mark vertical line across horizontal line scale intensity tooth sensitivity . Then , distance mm zero end measure aid millimeter ruler . Oral Health Impact Profile ( OHIP-Esthetics ) questionnaire Satisfaction measure use OHIP-Esthetics questionnaire validate Chilean Spanish .The questionnaire administer research operator baseline , one week , one month nine month ( prophylaxis ) bleaching . Each statement accompany Likert-type scale , generate score range 4 0 ( often = 4 , fairly often = 3 , occasionally = 2 , hardly never = 1 , never = 0 ) . These individual score add together give summary score range 0 ( minimum ) 56 ( maximum ) . The outcome consider sum OHIP-Esthetics dimension score . The internal consistency evaluate use Cronbach 's Alpha test . The Psychosocial Impact Dental Esthetics Questionnaire ( PIDAQ ) questionnaire The questionnaire consist 23 item group four component use factor analysis : 1 ) dental self-confidence ; 2 ) social impact ; 3 ) psychosocial impact ; 4 ) esthetic concern .9 The first factor , dental self-confidence , consist six item self-confidence scale . The second factor , social impact , contain eight item social aspect scale quality life questionnaire . The third factor , psychosocial impact , derive six formulate item relate mainly psychosocial impact dental esthetic . The fourth factor esthetic . The patient ask evaluate item use five-point Likert scale numerical value 0 = `` '' , 1 = `` little '' , 2 = `` somewhat '' , 3 = `` strongly '' 4 = `` strongly '' . The questionnaire administer research operator baseline , one week , one month , nine month ( prophylaxis ) bleaching validated Spanish confidence report Cronbach´s alpha 0.90.10 The outcome consider sum PIDAQ questionnaire factor score ; internal consistency evaluate use Cronbach 's Alpha test . Orofacial Esthetic Scale ( OES ) The Orofacial Esthetic Scale originally develop Swedish language , OES-S. For international use , OES-S translate English , result OES-E . The OES consist eight question , assess appearance face , profile , mouth , tooth alignment , tooth shape , tooth colour gum , well overall impression oro-facial aesthetic . Answers eight question score 11-point numeric rating scale , range 'Very dissatisfied ' ( score 0 ) 'Very satisfied ' ( score 10 ) . The score first seven item add summary score . Therefore , OES summary score range 0 ( bad score -patient dissatisfy aesthetic item ) 70 ( best score - patient satisfy aesthetic item ) . The score eighth item ( overall impression score ) judge separately , thus range 0 ( bad score - patient dissatisfy global assessment ) 10 ( best score - patient satisfy global assessment ) . Hence , low score imply impaired self-perceived oro-facial aesthetic . Sample size calculation Based previous study consider difference 4 unit domain clinically important . With significance level 5 % power 90 % , minimum sample size 58 participant per group would require detect difference 4 unit one domains questionnaire comparison . Data collection statistical analysis Data OHIP-Esthetics PIDAQ OES collect spreadsheet analyzed psychologist blind group assignment . Normality data bleach homogeneity variance-covariance matrix evaluate Kolmogórov-Smirnov test . As data normally distribute , treatment efficacy ( ΔE ΔSGU ) evaluate respect color change use Wilcoxon Signed Rank test . The mean intensity tooth sensitivity VAS scale report mean standard deviation . The percentage patient experience tooth sensitivity least bleach therapy consider absolute risk tooth sensitivity , report percentage 95 % confidence interval . All statistical analysis perform use SPSS 22.0 ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL , USA ) level significance 5 % ( α = 0.05 ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy patient Anterior teeth without restoration , previous bleaching procedure , cervical lesion , dental pain Pregnant lactating , Had moderate severe fluorosis , Tetracycline stain , Orthodontic treatment , Periodontal disease , Orofacial tumor , Trauma , Tooth malformation Were take analgesic , antiinflammatory , antibiotic drug
